name: Melissa Hearon
text: I want to start off by saying I usually love Holston Gases I buy all my welding supply and propane from them. For the most part they have a very good staff.  I was very disappointed with them this morning when I called at 7 a.m. to get some propane delivery before the storm. I was told they was closed because the weather coming in and my name would be added to a list for delivery when they reopen.

name: Nora Anderson
text: We had one of the worst experiences ever with a propane company.  The guy at the desk did not want to fill our tank on on motorhome, when he said he would I understand why he did not want to do it he had no ideal how to fill a tank.  He freaked out and told us there was something wrong, well that is the overfill valve, he didn't know what that was!!  Then he wanted to charge us 2X's what we were quoted, lucky for us the person who stated our original price was there and he had to charge us what was quoted.  I suggest do not let that man ever fill anything!!   Will never go to them again.

name: Thomas Ostrander
text:
In addition to the various industrial gasses they supply. They also have a very nice selection of welding supplies. Everything from flints, to coats, to multi-thousand dollar welders.
As a welding student at Calhoun Community College I really appreciate that the staff know exactly what you're looking for, even if you don't, and will have it for you in seconds. They also have never tried to upsell me on anything or batted an eyelash at me walking in and only buying a $16 pair of gloves.

name: Jim Macaulay
text: Staff is always helpful one of the best places to get welding supplies

resp.text: Thank you Jim! We are always happy to help!

name: Todd Bohn
text: Very well run organization. Also, if you are a welding student,  you get a discount.  Check with them on this for the details.

name: Stuart
text: Very helpful and knowledgeable staff, I always come here to get all my food grade co2 beverage and gas needs.

name: Joe Brewer
text: Refuses to refill bottles the sold me a few years ago. I doubt I will be back.

name: Ted Sheckler
text: Outstanding customer service! Everyone there is professional and courteous! Highly recommend!!

name: Russell Tayler
text: Dealing with Clark has been a great experience his knowledge in the welding supply business has been a truly eye opening experience. I went in there almost with an arrogant attitude thinking that i knew what I wanted. But after listening to me patiently and asking questions, and finding out what I really needed he put me on to the right product. Thanks Clark I cant believe that I have not been using this for my welding applications.

name: Taylor holley
text: Went there an waited at the counter a lady just looked at me but wouldn't help... Horrible service

resp.text: We are sorry that our Customer Service Rep was tied up and unable to speak with you when you came in. Please give us another chance to show you our normally outstanding customer service.

name: Bruce Jones
text: Very good prices with excellent customer service

name: ROY TAYLOR
text: Great place

name: Jason Grant
text: they have anything you need

name: Lacy Farms
text: This is a very nice Welding Supply house. They have the best showroom.

name: Jennifer uabmc
text: Nobody inside the building wearing masks, or bothered to put one on when I walked in today. Gross that they can’t even pretend to care about customer health and safety for 1 minute. A group of guys just standing in a circle behind the counter chatting away.

resp.text: We appreciate your taking time to review our company. Customer safety is and remains a priority.  This morning, we included your comment in our morning safety meeting.  Should you wish to talk more about this or have concerns in the future, please contact Kevin, the local branch manager, at (205) 841-0713

name: Benjamin Keith
text: Great place to meet All of your welding and relavent gas needs. They're so good at what they do, even their competitors secretly buy supplies from them. Hands-down the Best in the Business!

name: Joshua Parris
text: Quick service, super friendly and very knowledgeable staff. I'd definitely recommend them over the other welding supply stores in town.

name: leo harrell
text: They are very good at helping you find what you need if they don't sale it they would point you in the right direction

name: Matt Shabani
text: The best in the game!  Airgas who???? Nexair who??? Never heard of them!

name: Derrick Winfrey
text: Will drive past a airgas every time to come here, fast, friendly, and much better selection for real craftsmen that want the best

name: Deane Salyers
text: They have everything you need for your job needs.

name: Jon Grigsby
text: Upon moving to Cullman, I needed a local place to get my gasses, argon, oxygen and acetylene for my shop.  At first they were happy to help, exchanging cylinders as needed.  But then the owner put in a policy that required an account.  I was turned away at a time when I really needed more argon, mid job.  Ended up going back to praxair in Bessemer.  I don't understand turning down money.  They must have so much business they don't need mine.  Best of luck.

name: donnie collins
text: best place to get 30 gallon tanks and bigger for propane.

name: Kim Kimbrough
text: Very helpful

name: William Sterling
text: They will NOT answer the phone after 4pm even though They close at 4:30 And this time I had just left there My call was ignored three times!!! It makes sense now because the phone was ringing when I was there. You always have to get the other salesperson to help you out because the one you're dealing with has already closed as register for the day even though it's nowhere close to closing time. If you can't handle a 7 hour shift go home and let someone else have your job that wants it!!

name: Mark Jarrell
text: Knowledgeable sales staff, good stock/variety and competitive pricing. Will be back for any welding consumables or supplies I need in the future

name: Mike Macon
text: A quick stop and go with great courtesy and professional treatment.

name: Cecil Warren
text: It was a pleasant atmosphere good service the guys were great the price was great

name: Mike Fischer Fish
text: A good on my own business. Family service Hometown treatment

name: Zane Mason
text: Service was great and they had everything needed at a good price!

name: Donald Horton
text: The employees are very kind and helpful. Mr. Dennis met me on more than one occasion to assist me, and he was very, very kind.

name: Samuel Tullis
text: One of the top tier businesses in the River Region (Montgomery County). The Owners Love God, and operate with top integrity to make sure the customer is satisfied!

name: Phillip Rapp
text: Needed CO2 for some kegs. The guys in here are great. Thank you for your help!

name: Alan Marlow
text: The person working here was extremely helpful and friendly. I highly recommend this place!

name: Ronnie Bedsole
text: Super helpful group here

name: Cason Baker
text: Great place for welding test, tips, and supplies

name: Kenny Tran
text: This Wesco facility has the best faculty and staff ever. They are very nice and helpful. If you are here to purchase welding supplies, I suggest you talk to the sales representative to see what item better suits your needs. They also have a testing facility that will get you AWS certified. I will definitely be purchasing from this location again!

name: 18 Speed
text: unload quick within an hr .

name: Audrey Hyatt
text: Curtious Customer Service. Maybe a little partial to the Male customer, but overall a good experience. Clean store.

name: Dane Reeves
text: Called twice to ask about products and services and was hung up on both times. The first time, after she acknowledged me and the second time just after she picked up the phone .

name: James Gilmore
text: I was sent to pick up item for my company (Mullinax Ford). Staff very friendly

name: Kenneth Thornton
text: Good customer service.

name: Lorin Sumpter
text: The welding supplies you need are waiting patiently with a good staff to assist.

name: George Glass
text: Great people that work their

name: David Welch
text: Great Staff , great prices , always willing to help you , no matter what you are doing !

name: David Kilburn
text: They gave me a great deal on a long handle Smith torch. Very much appreciated

name: James Freeman
text: The best ever

name: Tony Studdard
text: Great customer service. Friendly and personal.

name: Theresa Perdue
text:
The staff is very friendly and prices are great.
I went to exchange some tanks we had bought my husband as I was walking into business they were actually on the phone with him.

name: Xquizet
text: As long as you speak with management you can get things resolved pretty quickly

name: Albert Turley
text: Went ther las week for safety glasses & they said they would order they ! Still not in ! !  - don't believe they did Order !

name: Mark H
text: This is a difficult company to work with.  They do not respond to the needs of their customers.  I am very disappointed with their customer service.

name: Ricky Montgomery
text: Great service.

name: William Wheat
text: Good stock of welding supplies, a little pricey and employees not very helpful

name: Marco Antonio Peregrina Sauce
text:
(Translated by Google) Excellent service

(Original)
Excelente servicio

name: Cohen Palmer
text: Usually fast and easy.

name: Ann Legg
text:
Your people were very helpful.
They even used the fork lift to get more product down for us.

name: Steve Russell
text: The crew here goes out of their way to help me and my business.

name: rod rosser
text: Sam helps everyone. Great employee. Deresa ( misspelled maybe) is also a great Smiling helper.

name: David Cunningham
text: They quickly located the tool I needed online and guided me right to it. Thank you.

name: Joseph Woodham
text: A good visit,  employees very helpful with selection of product.

name: Bill Tiemann
text: The pro desk was very helpful in locating product and very friendly.

name: Laroy Kirkland
text: Great people......cece is fantastic service pro

name: Benjamin Ford
text: The people in Wesco are some of the friendliest and most knowledge that I have had the pleasure to deal with. I can call them with issues and if they cannot help me they point me in the correct direction, even if it has been a competitor. I do not even shop around anymore because their level of service far exceeds anything experienced today. It is a pleasure going in and just talking with them. Highly recommend them for all of your welding needs.

name: Scott Yant
text: Friendly , knowledgeable people with good products & prices.

name: Boone Myers
text: Hands down the best welding supply store I’ve ever dealt with. Very quick service and the employees are very helpful and knowledgeable. I’ll be going back for any welding supply needs.

name: Clint Grantham
text: Honesty goes a long way.  Some of the most honest men I've done business with in a while.    I look forward to doing business with your in the future.

name: Christopher Senn
text: I'm a student at Wallace college. I went inside wesco to purchase a file card. The new help they have hired asked if I needed help finding anything but didn't even know what I was looking for. He then followed me around as if I were going to steal something. He was very unprofessional. Lost my business permanently!

resp.text: Fortunately, the experience you had at WESCO is far from typical.  We do apologize for the misunderstanding and would welcome the opportunity to show the community WESCO has to offer.  We appreciated any feedback that will give us the opportunity to continue being a good partner in the community.

name: s vanhoveln
text: Friendly, easy to work with, and much better prices for gas than competitors.

name: James McCord
text: I could not ask for better service.

name: corbin king
text: Great place to shop with great employees.

name: Christopher Senn
text: After being treated like a thief at Wesco, I went to Airgas. They were very polite and helpful.  I was able to shop without being followed around. They are now my go to for supplies

name: Randy Wolf
text: Fast and friendly service. The guys at the city sales desk answered all my questions  professionally and in great detail that made me feel as if I was getting advice from a long time friend.

name: Barry Johnson
text: Super nice folks, great prices.  It is worth the drive to find these guys

name: William Leake
text: Prompt service, got me in and out in no time ,Thanks

name: Rick Maze
text: Good staff. Good selection. Price is high but they can work with you on it.

name: Scott Suttle
text: Knowledgeable staff.

name: Dennis Turnbaugh
text: Store great, employees werent to helpful! No prices on products and they made it seem like it was a Hassle to look a price up for me... So i didnt stay long and purchased my list elsewhere. Which was a $800 list. Other than that my experience was good!

name: William McPherson
text: Great employees that really help you out!! They have any gas that you need. Thanks

name: Mike Hump
text: Good store well stocked service a little slow

name: Mark Turner
text: The men behind the counter,answered the call,gave me the info I needed,and was there with the parts I was in search of!

name: Niki Jensen
text: They were kind, but i tried to bring my tanks up there 3 days in a row. One of those three days was a family emergency on their end. Completely understandable. (thus the 2 stars) However; every time i tried to bring my tanks he was leaving, i just had to keep calling until he was there. Once they said he was there and I was going to bring my tanks he was leaving again, but I can't set an appointment.

name: CLAY GOODWIN
text: Tim and staff are great & knowledgeable people

name: Matt Braxton
text: Always stocked and friendly

name: Mike West
text: Have had many experiences with Tim & his Bride here . Would not shop for my welding needs anywhere else. Always has a very good inventory.

name: JC M
text: Very nice and knowledgeable staff.  Was happy to order what I wanted in the correct size for me.

name: David Pruitt
text: The place is top notch, they have all your welding needs and very knowledgeable and willing to help you.

name: Phillip Johnson
text: Great service and knowledgeable staff!! I like the small town feel and the way business is conducted, they treat everyone like they are important.

name: Paul Johnston
text: Well stocked with ecentials as hoods, gloves, and welding needs.

name: Tina Lang Cook
text:
Need someone to help load and load..
Sorry lady's just to heavy

name: Jason Hulsey
text: Super nice people, very helpful. The location has great parking and is close to other convenient locations in Hartselle. I will be a customer for a long time based on the experience I had today.

name: Jacqueline
text: Always great service here!

name: Alden Harrison
text: Very friendly and helpful

name: Brett Smith
text: 🤔🤔🤔They were bought out by Airgas Gulf States.........

name: Gorman Cassidy
text: Really helpful with product information and recommendations on different types of gases and uses, affordable and has nice equipment and accessories!

name: Kathleen Faulkner
text: Helped me get a 20lb c02 tank quickly!!

name: Samuel Tullis
text: Very Professional Staff

name: Timtimtimtim Timtimtim
text: GAS

name: james pendley
text: We're very friendly and helpful and everything I needed. Unlike the other welding store in the area that told me they just soon me find somewhere else to do business.

name: Alan Goodman
text: Half price for same stuff as big businesses, this is only place to shop for welding supply!

name: J316
text: Great place to buy refill C02 bottles for home brewing.

name: Jeremy Mize
text: A1 service

name: Artie Rose
text: Great service and great people, very knowledgeable about welding supplies and all types of gases.

name: Dan S
text: Very friendly and informative,  great customer service! I will definitely use them again. Thank you! Great place to get dry ice for anything you need!

name: Jarvius Walls
text: Just had an interview with Mr. Craig. Super cool dude. Whether I get the job or not, the experience was professional. Seems like a nice place to work.

name: Arthur Rose
text: Welding equipment and supplies, all types of compressed and Liquid gases

name: Thomas Hughes
text: Great company to deal with, excellent customer service.

name: Grace Dyal
text: Seems like the sales person was learning, but did good job. They had to order lens which was supposed to come to my house but he called and told me they were delivered to the store instead.  He was going to resend them them to my address, but I was going to be in Sylacauga the next day so I asked him to keep them and I would and did come by and get them.

name: Matt Dodgen
text: Price double between a phone quote and the time it took me to get there

name: Eric Cook
text: Just seemed a little high $134 to fill a tank of Argon??

name: Kim Kimbrough
text: Great people

name: Eric Dumas
text: Great service alot of hard to find ironworker tools and plenty of welding supplies

name: BOSS HOG Torque Converters
text: They were very helpful and listened to what I really needed.  I would suggest that you check them out. Welding is what we do.

name: Jack Horton
text: They have drove the price up as of late .will go to young welding next time.

name: Roger1967 Roger1967
text: Very helpful

name: Nathan Jenkins
text: Nate and all of the employees down at Wesco Gas and Welding Supply in Foley Alabama are some of the friendliest most helpful guys in town. Whether you're a professional spending thousands of dollars on the best equipment money can buy for your livelihood or just a hobbyist like myself. Proudly sticking metal together, making bad welds and thinking to yourself the whole time that you're going to be the next Wayne Gretzky of welding when in turn you're actually the Helen Keller of welding but that's neither here nor there. The guys at Wesco will do their best to help us Gretzky's do the best we can do in order to achieve a welding hobby on a budget. Personally I will not buy any of my welding products anywhere else due to the fact when I walk out of there I know and understand what I spent the money on and have the confidence knowing that it's going to do the right job for me. Sure I could probably get it a little bit cheaper right down the street but I'm going to get an inferior product sold to me by a person who probably knows more about cooking burgers from across the street at Burger King than selling what welding and gas supplies.

name: Roy “R” C
text: Great place,  friendly people and amazing service attitude!

name: James Eiland
text: Great service.

name: James C Gibson
text: Great service , had more on the shelf than I expected , great place to do buisness

name: James Lick
text: They were  very informative, it seams to be a one stop shop

name: James Scott
text: Nate was very helpful and a pleasure to work with, thank you.
